transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji boliye
Customer: Ha ji good evening good evening kaise hain aap
Executive: Good evening kya seva karu
Customer: Bas badhiya sir main keh raha tha ki Tannu keh rahi thi usse baat hui thi to maine pucha Tannu se maine kaha kya baat hogi maine tumko not satisfied de diya to keh rahi thi mere se to acche se baat hui thi madam ne pata nahi kyu diya mere ko not satisfied
Executive: Kyunki mere pass lead nahi aa rahi hai maine isliye not satisfied diya hai ek to maine jidd kar karke purchase karwaya
Customer: Nahi kaha pe lead kyu nahi aa rahi maine abhi main aapka account open karke baitha tha
Executive: Dekho aur samjho hum company mein baithe hain hai na
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ek do kilo ka quantity hum nahi lenge
Customer: Thik hai
Executive: Hai na chahiye bulk mein
Customer: Wo aa nahi raha hai
Executive: Thik hai ek second ruko dealing to all over India mein hai na apni
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ye dekho abhi kya naam hai 500 ml ka 15 can ka aaya hua tha Ujjain se 10000 se 20000 ka order value tha iska
Executive: Kiska aaya tha
Customer: 120000 ka bhi aaya hua hai ek second
Executive: Ye hai degreaser ka hai
Executive: To wahi to baat hai pickling passivation ka hona chahiye na
Customer: Kis cheez ka
Executive: Pickling aur passivation ka abhi Tannu madam ne mere ko ek lead dikha ke satisfy kar diya madam dekho aa gayi thi thik hai ek lead mere se miss ho gayi lekin kitne kitne din se main unko message kar rahi hu
Customer: Kis mein bhi karte ho aap dealer ye pickling paste mein
Executive: Pickling passivation mein hi karte hain
Customer: Pickling paste mein nahi karte aap deal accha
Executive: Are pickling passivation hi karte hain
Customer: Haan nahi karte na wahi keh raha hu nahi karte hai na
Executive: Usme hi karte hain sir kya
Customer: Usme hi karte hain to madam ye aayi thi aayi thi ye kya naam hai 125000 rupaye ka order aaya tha kal ki date mein Aurangabad se hui thi baat ispe
Executive: Isi liye to ek mere se miss ho gayi wo mujhe Tannu madam ne photo khich ke bhej diya abhi main pichle ek hafte se dekh rahi hu mera IndiaMART ka lead waste hi ja raha hai fir main chhoti chhoti quantity wala open kar deti hu lead consume karne ke liye
Customer: Nahi mam dekho wo jo aap jo dekh rahe ho na lead quantity wala main wo ek form humne hum log bahut cliento se feedback yahi lete hain thik hai aur kabhi kabhi client ko bolte hain sir aapne bulk ki lead li thi lekin uski quantity ek ya do piece ki thi wo ek form bharne ke liye waha dalte hain hum log ek wo client apne tentative idea se kuch bhi likh dete hain uske andar figure ki ek piece chahiye 10 chahiye 100 chahiye humare ko to aisa nahi hoga ki wo usse jitna likha utna hi chahiye hoga usko to
Executive: Abhi nahi hai ye batao
Customer: Jo bhi product se jo bhi aapko product relevant hai na mere ko sir ka pressure aa raha hai thik hai ki agar tumse nahi ho raha hai to mat karo next year se main nahi karta hu continue main abhi unko
Executive: Nahi kyu na karo nahi kyu kya lead aa rahi hai hum karenge business ho jayega
Customer: Aap kya karoge main pichle teen char din se Tannu madam ko message kar rahi hu aaj maine unko call kiya 12 baje mujhe bole 10 minute teen char din se mera reply to waise bhi nahi kar rahe hain wo log aaj maine call kiya mujhe bataiye nahi aap mujhe batao na main 10 minute unka 3:30 baje hua hai aapko pata hai
Executive: Are mere ko bata dete main immediate kar deta
Customer: Unhone uska photo khich ke bhej diya main kya karu abhi
Executive: Mere ko batao na main baitha hu na
Customer: Aap ek baar kya naam hai video meeting kar karke catalog sahi karwaya aapne unse
Executive: Sahi nahi unhone bas mujhe bataya tha ki jo lead aapki kaam ki nahi hai usko not relevant mein karo wo main kitne din se kar rahi hu main thak gayi hu
Customer: Nahi wo to main samajh gaya ha wo to kar theek hai nahi kar ek kaam karte hain thoda sa catalog pe workout karte hain kal aap ek baar video meeting pe mere sath connect ho jao thoda bahut main aapke catalog pe workout karwa deta hu mam iske andar apni taraf se aap video meeting pe aap aaoge na to main sara kaam se baat karungi fir wo rudely baat karenge fir main nahi janti aapko pata hai unka tone
Executive: Nahi nahi rudely baat karne ki naubat aayegi nahi pehli baat
Customer: Ek baar to hum log product thik kar denge na
Executive: Aap dekho ek ek month ho gaya hai thik hai purchase kiya uska ek month se ek month mein maine bas ek hi customer nikala hai wo bhi 12 kilo ka
Customer: Baaki sahi hai order
Customer: Agar order hi nahi aa rahe to hum kyu ispe paise de
Executive: Accha
Executive: Nahi main kya keh raha hu kal video meeting pe aake thoda bahut ho raha hai ki tum log kar kya rahe ho pura din baith ke abhi unko kaun samjhaye ki ye dikkate aa rahi hai unko main bolu ki sir lead nahi hai to kehte tum log baat karo tum log baat nahi karte kya baat karu main
Executive: Ek baar main kya bol raha hu ki ek baar kal ispe baith ke thoda sa catalog bhi thik karenge aur dekhenge ki kya PIC ke ha main kal keh raha hu main wahi keh raha hu kal apna aa jao ek baar video meeting pe aap aa jaiye ek baar is keyword mapping wagera sab kuch check kar lete hain iski ki kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai jaisa ki abhi 6 ghante pehle pickling paste ki requirement aayi thi abhi Bharat se aayi hui hai pickling gel ki aayi hui hai requirement aur pickling paste ki Odisha se aayi hui hai fir stainless steel pickling gel ki aayi hui hai Delhi se aayi hui hai stainless steel pickling gel ki Delhi se aayi hui hai aayi hui hai
Customer: Quantity bhi dekhiye na sir samne
Executive: Mam main dekh main wahi main keh raha hu aap quantity pe na itna bhi jor mat dijiye aap buyer ko na pick karo kya pata uski requirement jyada ki nikal jaye 100% niklegi main keh raha hu aapse aap ye mat socho ki usne kya likha hai kyuki mam har kisi ko pata hai ki koi bhi banda agar lead dal raha hai wo aise nahi dalega ki yaar usko ek piece chahiye wo lead dal dega usko pata hai ki abhi yaar mere pass to call aana shuru ho jayega wo aisa kyu karega apni musibat kyu lega ki usko pata hai ki ab mere pass ab sara din call aate rahenge wo apna kaam karega call attend karta rahega mam
Executive: Aur waise bhi ek aadha kilo ke liye to banda market mein jaake waise consume kar le lega product mam wo IndiaMART jaise platform pe kyu itna sara kaam karega
Customer: Chalo thik hai aap kal connect kariye mere sath abhi mera time ho gaya hai jaane ka waise bhi
Executive: Ha wo mere ko pata hai aapka time ho gaya to tabhi main kuch jaldi se aapse baat karne ki thik hai kal aap kitne baje connect karengi video meeting pe aap batao aap bolo aap kab kar rahe ho
Executive: Main to subah office aa jata hu main to main to 9:30 baje office aa jata hu main to baat kariye
Customer: 12 ke baad
Customer: Haan
Executive: Thik hai kal 12 ke baje ke baad aake main aapko na video meeting mein sara dikha deta hu main aapko ek baar thik hai to filhal main abhi aapka ek concern close kar raha hu aur 12 baje ka sharp aap aa jana puri mapping sahi kar dunga images wagera jo nahi lagi wo kar dunga specification description sab main add kar dunga uske andar aapke
Customer: Thik hai
Executive: Thik hai mam right thank you
Customer: Thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough relevant leads.

- Dissatisfied with the support from Tannu madam.

- Feels IndiaMART leads are going to waste.

- Expresses concern about boss's pressure.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to fix catalog.

- Executive assured to correct mapping and add images.

- Executive will add specification description.

- Executive closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, video meeting, pickling paste
